text: This is the best thing I've read all year. Not just because I nodded along to the first section so hard my head nearly fell off, and not because it nearly fell off (more) when I saw @holly_cummins mention me by name. But because It's All True. https://t.co/Uxcv3jQhpQ

author.name: Trisha Gee | @trishagee@mastodon.social
author.description:
Engineer, author, keynote speaker, developer champion, catalyst. 
She/her.
